pages.text: $(li)The Ender Eye is a mysterious item that holds an extrange power in its interior.$(br)$(li)This item can be used to craft an $(l:patchouli:redstone/quark/ender_watcher)Ender Watcher$(/l), $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/end_crystal)End Crystals$(/l), $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/ender_chest)Ender Chests$(/l), the $(l:patchouli:enders_journey/ender_eyes)Witch Eye$(/l), and $(l:patchouli:enders_journey/ender_eyes)End Crystal Eye$(/l).
